Html:
I want to create a scatter plot, so I'm not passing in a pen for the line (because I only want points) when calling AddLineGraph - but without a line, there is no legend.

Is it possible to have a legend for a point graph?

Hi,

 

Currently it is not possible to display a legend item for marker graph using D3 'out of the box', but you can modify it so that it display such a legend item. Take a look into the code in D3\Descriptions folder.

If you have any questions about implementing a legend item for marker chart, do not hesitate to ask them here.

 

Best regards,

Mikhail Brinchuk.

Hi there,

I'm currently right at that point - I need legend items for a marker chart I'm using. Unfortunately I couldn't get a clue on how to do it yet. Any hints? 

Best regards,

Alexander Dittrich.
